title: Onboarding - DOB over 18yrs old
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.13.0 or later, iOS 13.0.0 or later)
AND User's mlb.com account has an age above 18 already set up

*GAE onboarding for customer w/ DOB over 18 [Acct to use: ballpark.applause@gmail.com / PW: BPapp123]

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user accesses the GAE Registration deeplink* (ballpark://go-ahead)

*the deeplink is currently configured to show as 'Go-Ahead Entry' in More Menu (for STG and QA envs)
custom_steps_separated.expected:

AND a checkbox is shown w/ text 'By tapping "Get Started" I agree to MLB's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy' [checkbox is unchecked initially]**
AND a checkbox is shown w/ text 'I attest that I am eighteen (18) years of age or older.' [checkbox is unchecked initially]
AND user display with Cancel or X button on Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration


**Terms of Use is a link directing user to external browser with Terms
**Privacy Policy is a link directing user to external browser with Policy
[iOS Terms and PP links are not underlined]

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scroll left to right (2nd screen)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 2: GAE - SignUp page, Carousel 2]

THEN user display with further instructions

*Title: First we'll capture an image of your face.
*Description: This image will be used by a service provider solely to create an alphanumeric MLB Go-Ahead ID for you and then immediately discarded.

AND 'Learn more' CTA underlined*\
AND Get Started button remains disabled
AND Terms and Services checkbox is displayed without check
AND Age confirmation checkbox is displayed without check
AND user display with Cancel or X button on Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Learn more' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 4: GAE - Learn More link (mlb.com page)]

THEN the 'Learn more' link directs user to external browser with more info (mlb.com page)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scroll left to right (3rd screen)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 3: GAE - SignUp page, Carousel 3]

THEN user display with further instructions

*Title: At the ballpark, head to a designated Go-Ahead Entry gate
*Description: Your tickets will already be tied to your Go-Ahead ID. All ticketed individuals in your group will be captured by the Go-Ahead cameras.

AND 'Learn more' CTA underlined*
AND Get Started button remains disabled
AND Terms and Services checkbox is displayed without check
AND Age confirmation checkbox is displayed without check
AND user display with Cancel or X button on Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration

*Learn more is a link directing user to external browser with more info

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User acknowledges Terms and Privacy
AND User acknowledges Age
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be able to checkmark MLB ID Terms of Use and Privacy Policy (Checkbox filled up with black color)
AND User should be able to checkmark the age stipulation 'I attest that I am eighteen (18) years of age or older.' (Checkbox filled up with black color)

THEN Get Started button should be enabled with black color in white text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Get Started' within the Go-Ahead Entry page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[SKIP VALIDATION IF CAMERA ACCESS WAS PREV ALLOWED - PROCEED TO NEXT STEP]

[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 5: Device Prompt - Camera access (when DOB over 18)]


THEN user should display with Camera Prompt

Android/iOS:
Standard Existing Camera Promot modal OR
"Ballpark" Would Like to Access the Camera
Ballpark uses the camera to capture photos and videos.

AND 'Don't Allow' and 'Okay' CTAs shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user grants (or has prev granted Camera access)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 6: GAE - Capture to generate MLB GAE ID (when DOB over 18)] 


THEN user should be able to proceed with NEC for enrollment to Go Ahead Entry
AND the page shows:
GO-AHEAD ENTRY shown in Home Plate with MLB logo
Description: We’ll take a quick capture to generate your MLB Go-Ahead ID

AND 'Continue' CTA shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Continue
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 7: GAE - Image capturing w/ recommendations below (when DOB over 18)]

THEN user should be directed to capture their facial image

Example Text display: Keep your face in the frame ....

[iOS/Android verbiage may differ - i.e. No Faces were detected inside the frame.]

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user successfully captured their facial image for Go-Ahead ID
AND NEC acceptance met
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 8: GAE - Generating GAE ID (when DOB over 18)]

THEN Home plate image should show in green color 
AND user displays with loading indicator displayed when image validation is in-progress
AND lottie animations(dots) within home plate shows on screen while generating Go-Ahead ID

Text display: Generating Go-Ahead ID...

[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 8: GAE - GAE - Success - All Set (when DOB over 18)]

AND the page shows:
Green (dotted) check icon mark
Text: You're all set!
Thanks for registering! When you arrive at the ballpark enter at the First Base Gate in the designated Go-Ahead Entry gate

AND 'Done' CTA shown

custom_steps_separated.expected:
[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 4: GAE - Learn More link (mlb.com page)]

title: My Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.13.0 or later, iOS 13.0.0 or later)
AND User's mlb.com account has an age above 18 already set up
AND user has completed the GAE Onboarding (including successful image capture)

*GAE onboarding for customer w/ DOB over 18 [Acct to use: ballpark.applause@gmail.com / PW: BPapp123]
custom_steps:
GIVEN User is on Home page
AND the user navigates to My Profile page (via Profile icon at the top right - initials)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User on My Profile page
AND user has already completed the successful enrollment in Go-Ahead Entry program
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be display with drawer option "MLB GO-Ahead ID" on My Profile page

* My Teams
* My Notifications
* My MLB Account Emails
* My Ticket Accounts
* MLB Go-Ahead ID

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on the "MLB Go-Ahead ID"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN selection of "MLB Go-Ahead ID" leads user to new view

[ANDROID/iOS PAGE 13: My Profile - GAE ID]

AND New view should displays user enrollment status 

MLB Go-Ahead ID - Header/Title

'< My Profile' on top left corner in same line as MLB Go-Ahead ID (Android)
OR  
* '< Back' on top left corner in same line as MLB Go-Ahead ID (iOS)

Text Display: 
The Go-Ahead Entry experience allows you to enter the stadium hands-free and is available at select ballparks. Tap here for more information and a list of participating ballparks.

MLB Go-Ahead ID - Enrolled(in green font) 

'Delete MLB Go-Ahead ID' display in blue within blue pills icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Tap here' within the MLB Go-Ahead ID profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to an external browser opened to an appropriate page* with more information on Go Ahead Entry

*the webpage may be temporarily set to mlb.com - It is configured as 'go_ahead_mlb_ballparks_url' in remote config

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on back navigation
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN selection of back navigation brings user to My Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on the "MLB Go-Ahead ID"
AND user taps on "Delete MLB Go-Ahead ID"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with Deletion prompt modal 

Body/Text: 

Delete MLB GO-Ahead ID 
Deleting your MLB Go-Ahead ID will remove your ID and require re-enrollment in the program. 

Delete Go-ahead ID - CTA
Cancel - CTA 

Note:Design may be vary Android vs iOS for this prompt Modal.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select "Delete"/"Delete Go-Ahead ID" on the Deletion prompt modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is removed from Go-Ahead entry program
AND the user is returned to My Profile page w/ MLB Go-Ahead ID entry removed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user successfully Unenrolled from MLB Go-Ahead ID
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should not display with MLB Go-Ahead Entry/ID drawer option on My Profile page
